items.title: FDA Extends Roflumilast’s AD Approval to Young Children
items.description: The approval is for children ages 2-5 with mild-to-moderate atopic dermatitis. Medscape Medical News

items.title: GERD Risk Higher With GLP-1s vs SGLT2s
items.description: New findings highlight a potential trade-off between the benefits of GLP-1 therapy and GI risks. Medscape Medical News
